trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> that may contain a collection of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Classe abstrata que, quando implementada, representa um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> que pode conter uma coleção de objetos filhos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> can be a child of another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> pode ser um filho de outro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class, with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> com propriedades padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado como filho deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: If this object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> it will be added to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> collection; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se esse objeto for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />, ele será adicionado à coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" />; caso contrário, uma exceção será gerada.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> filho a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="child" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto adicionado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma cadeia de caracteres de texto como um filho deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an InvalididOperationException unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> não aceita texto como um filho, para que esse método gerará uma InvalididOperationException, a menos que uma classe derivada substituiu esse comportamento que permite que o texto a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a type-specific clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: Cria um relógio de um tipo específico para essa linha do tempo.

trans-unit.source: A clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: Um relógio para essa linha do tempo.

trans-unit.source: If a derived class overrides this method, it should only create and return an object of a class inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: Se uma classe derivada substitui esse método, deve apenas criar e retornar um objeto de uma classe herdada de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of direct child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de objetos filhos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> diretos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Filho <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objetos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é **nulo**.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e referências de recurso (mas eles não podem mais resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true." />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências a recursos, vinculações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas seus valores atuais são.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object, using this instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de um novo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" />, usando essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filho a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto filho.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser adicionado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo do texto de um nó ao objeto.
